name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
role_name: Senior Intune Engineer / Intune & Autopilot Lead
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Intune Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in Microsoft Intune and Autopilot solutions for iOS and Windows device management. My expertise encompasses device provisioning, lifecycle management, and imaging processes, ensuring efficient deployment and reinstallation procedures. I am proficient in MDM frameworks and have extensive knowledge of patching strategies, enabling me to maintain compliance and optimize performance.

I possess strong documentation skills and a solid understanding of change management practices, contributing to effective service ownership and streamlined operations. My technical background also includes a unique blend of full-stack development, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with cloud services, specifically **Azure** and **AWS**. My ability to lead initiatives combines technical expertise with strategic insight, positioning me as a valuable asset in modern enterprise environments.
